solutionsSection.title_h1: SOLUTIONS AND BENEFITS DESIGNED FOR YOU
solutionsSection.description_p: At the ATTLAS Foundation, we work for the dignity and well-being of the most vulnerable: seniors, children, homeless people, and animals. Our mission is to provide comprehensive support that transforms lives and communities. We reorient economic justice toward projects that promote equity and social development. Our programs seek to empower communities through sustainable and supportive initiatives.

feature3.title: Home for Older Adults

solutionsSection.onu_desa:
The Attlas Org Foundation, REGISTERED in the database of the United Nations Department of Economic and Social Affairs (UN DESA - ONU), promotes the project "Colombia Debt Relief: A New Beginning", an initiative supported by the law firm Propensiones Internacional.

This program represents an innovative model of economic justice, designed to strengthen asset recovery and financial stability for vulnerable sectors through advanced legal mechanisms and specialized financial strategies. Based on the principles of international cooperation and sustainable development, this project not only seeks to alleviate the economic burdens of thousands of families, but also to establish a legal framework that guarantees their social inclusion and long-term stability.

csr.title: Economic Justice with a Human Heart
csr.p1: Economic Justice is not a theory: it is the hope we transform into action. In Quind√≠o, we believe that every senior citizen deserves a hot meal, every child a childhood filled with nutrition and love, and every stray animal a dignified shelter and care. Here we don't talk about numbers; we talk about dignity, life, and opportunity.
csr.p2: Inspired by the principles of the solidarity economy‚Äîwhich prioritizes equity, cooperation, and the common good over individual profit‚Äîwe commit before God to building real, deeply human economic justice. We believe that:
csr.p3: Solidarity is the best currency: when we share resources, we generate trust and build support networks that sustain our communities.
csr.p4: Redistribution is not about subtracting: it is about adding life by offering access to food, shelter, and care to those who need it most. Why Is economic justice vital in Quind√≠o?
csr.p5: In our department, where many families live on the edge of uncertainty, economic justice bridges the gap between fragility and strength. Through food for seniors and children, we open doors to health and stability. By providing loving shelters, we restore the dignity of those who have been forgotten: the elderly and our most vulnerable pets.
csr.p6: Because when we feed bodies, we comfort souls; when we protect life, we sow hope; and when we empower communities, we build a more just, supportive, and humane Quind√≠o.

Con fundamento en los principios de buena fe, transparencia, capacidad real de pago y progresividad en la recuperaci√≥n econ√≥mica, el suscrito propone a sus acreedores el siguiente plan de pago, que refleja su disposici√≥n voluntaria y honesta de cumplir sus obligaciones conforme a su situaci√≥n econ√≥mica actual y proyecciones razonables de mejora:

CUARTA: Una vez concluido el periodo de reorganizaci√≥n pactado, el deudor continuar√° con el pago de las obligaciones que tengan un plazo mayor, manteniendo su compromiso de cumplir con los acuerdos y ajustando las cuotas en la medida en que su situaci√≥n econ√≥mica evolucione favorablemente.

Nota 1: Se solicita a los acreedores la consideraci√≥n de una condonaci√≥n parcial de intereses, tanto corrientes como de mora, como muestra de buena fe y para facilitar el cumplimiento efectivo del plan de pagos.

Nota 2: Esta propuesta se realiza bajo el principio de transparencia y voluntad de pago. El deudor deja constancia de su intenci√≥n de aumentar los aportes en la medida en que su situaci√≥n econ√≥mica mejore, a fin de promover una soluci√≥n integral y equitativa.

Salvedad sobre el sacrificio de bienes esenciales: Se reconoce que este plan implica un esfuerzo significativo por parte del deudor, quien en algunos casos podr√≠a verse obligado a reducir gastos destinados a necesidades b√°sicas. No obstante, se mantiene el compromiso de priorizar sus obligaciones sin renunciar a los derechos fundamentales ni al sustento m√≠nimo vital.
